body.name: Cross Legged Office Chair, Armless Wide Desk Chair No Wheels, Modern Home Office Desk Chair Swivel Adjustable Fabric Vanity Chair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Wider Seat】If you like to maintain a correct sitting posture and sit cross-legged occasionally, this is the cross legged office chair for you. The 25.2’’ seat width and 18.7’’ seat depth provide you with more space and higher comfort.

【Adjustable Height】The height of this armless desk chair is adjustable, enabling to match most tables. The adjusting height range from the seat cushion to the floor is 15.94’’ -19.69’’ that suits for all ages.

【Premium Material】Cushion filled with high-density sponge along with padded backrest, this wide office chair is made for sedentary users, offering a cozy sitting experience even after long-time sitting.

【Sturdy】Designed with sturdy metal legs, this office chair no wheels supports up to 250lbs. The wheel-less construction of this armless office chair also gives it a stable frame with a balanced center of gravity and it’s not easy to slip.

【Easy Assembly】All necessary hardware and tools are included. The installation can be easily completed according to the installation video we provide. If you have any questions about this cross legged chair, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well built, easy to assemble, and great quality for the price! Comes with wheels and stationary legs! Very big, cushioned, and perfect for sitting with your legs up in the chair! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, comfortable and cute!
reviews.reviewText: I saw a chair like this on TikTok but really didn’t want to buy anything from there- luckily everyone in the comments was saying you could get the same thing on Amazon! This was the highest rated listing I found. Not only was it less expensive and free shipping, but it looks exactly like the ones I was seeing. Very comfortable, sturdy and looks nice. It was pretty easy to put together, though I needed an extra set of hands when aligning the backrest and seat. Happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 Highly Recommend! So Comfy!!
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect upgrade I needed. This chair is so comfortable and relaxing. I thought it was incredibly soft and has outstanding material for the padding and exterior. It was super easy to assemble. There are four steps with eight screws. The third step is the hardest because you have to align the holes of the bar attached to the backrest and the holes on the bottom of the seat. Once you get the first screw in though, it’s smooth sailing after that. It took me max 10 minutes to assemble and indulge in some relaxation. The only issue that I have overall is that I wish the seat was longer. Its width is perfect but it could be longer. Overall, this is a fantastic chair and I will be significantly more comfortable while I study.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Approved by Fat People!
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’ 8, 275 pounds. While I cannot cross my legs in it (still slightly too small for such) it’s definitely a good size for sitting without feeling like I’m riding a bike on one of those tiny little desk chairs. Now I will admit this chairs predecessor was a large multi hundred dollar big and tall chair so I have extremely high expectations for what I need in a chair as I’m a editor and need to sit for hours at a time. However, this chair is aesthetically pleasing and much more minimal- which looks better in our bedroom.If design is a concern, this is it. It’s firm, but still comfortable. A great task chair for the price. But if you’re looking for an amazing comfortable chair, this is not it- but this was not designed to be that. If you’re looking for a chair to do hours and hours of computer work on a regular basis, then go to a local office supply store and buy yourself a big girl chair. If you’re looking for a budget friendly and very attractive chair for a work space to spend minimal time at here and there, this is good.Also- for context, my husband is 6’5- 350 pounds. He also approves of the chair.So does my cat. Large cat for size comparison.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy seat, smooth spins & easy to build
reviews.reviewText: I received my package earlier than expected- it did arrive in its original box and not in an amazon box, so beware if thieves are common where you are; everyone knew what I purchased because the box had an image of the chair and in big letters "office chair."Set up took maybe 30-35 minutes and assembly was easy. I read some reviews from people who had a hard time installing the seat, so maybe that expectation softened the blow, but it was simple for myself.The seat itself is wide and has decent back support for what I am looking for. I can sit comfortably with my legs crossed and still have some room. The height adjustment is incredibly smooth. My only concern over time is the base and wheels. The chair has the option to use the wheels or go without, which I do appreciate.I will give an update if something does go awry, but fresh out of the box, I would recommend anyone to purchase this chair. It shipped quicker than expected, simple to assemble and turned out to be very comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice office chair
reviews.reviewText: For the price I'm very happy with this chair. Very easy to assemble and the instructions were clear and short. I find it very comfortable to sit on. For those having trouble lining up the holes, you really have to shove the two pieces together. It makes sense when you are doing it. This is where having two people would be helpful because one person could be pushing down and the other could be tightening the screws, but I was still able to do it by myself. The fabric wrinkles a bit where you sit but not a deal breaker. Like I said, good for the price! The color gray is very accurate to the pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is super comfortable and stylish. It was very easy to put together. It came with extra screws and a sturdy wrench. I highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sized chair.
reviews.reviewText: I like to sit weird while working and typically never lean on arm rest/holders. This chair has accommodated my criss-cross and weird sitting habits. The chair is huge and comfy. It was easy to put together.. think it only took about 15mins. Noting for others, it does not have rolling (which wasn’t a problem or need for me) but the chair seat does twist and turn. Recommend for the price if you are needing a big chair that allows for all sitting ways!
